page.title: 03Wester Campsie Glenalmond
page.content: This farm has an acreage of {178 acres and it is fallow area for Aberdeen Angus,Char Leys and commercial cattle. Sheep are also kept on the farm. The owners are in the Smithfield and are regular visitors to the Royal Highland Show and Smithfield. There is not much of a winter death rate as the livestock is kept inside all this time.{Some crop}is grown, but it is mainly a livestock farm. The College{buys}all its {fruit and {vegetables}from this farm, but business profits still go up and down. The College does not cause any problems for Wester Campsie, nor do poachers. There is not much leisure time available in this job and religion is not a strong factor in life.
